The claim was made in a Gavin Newsom for: 2. Gavin Newsom led the passage of Proposition 63 in 2016, which imposed background checks on ammunition purchases and required a state license to sell ammunition.
Other California politicians: such as Dianne Feinstein and Tom Bradley, had previously taken on the National Rifle Association and implemented gun control measures.
Expert opinion from Sherry Bebitch Jeffe: a professor of public policy at USC, states that the claim about Newsom being "the first" to take on the NRA does not hold up to the facts.
